extends greenfoot.Actor

A deck that deals cards.

Method Detail

addCard

public void addCard(Card card)
Puts a card into the deck.

Parameters:
card - the card to put in the deck.

drawCard

public Card drawCard()
Draw a card from the deck.

Returns:
the card that's been drawn, or null if no cards are left.

fill

public void fill()
Fill the deck with a complete set of cards. Get rid of any cards still in the deck.

getSize

public int getSize()
Get the size of the deck

Returns:
the number of cards left in the deck

hasJokers

public boolean hasJokers()
Determine whether the deck contains jokers.

Returns:
true if the deck contains jokers, false otherwise.

showCard

public Card showCard()
Shows a card from the deck. Same as drawCard, but doesn't remove it.

Returns:
the card that's been shown, or null if no cards are left.

shuffle

public void shuffle()
Shuffle the deck
